channel.title: Glitch
channel.description:
On my Server an item is glitched. It is not in a different place but it is like a verac brassard but recoloured but you still see the top clothes, it is sopossed to not show parts of the shirt, only the brassard. This is what i mean
[b][u]ReColoured Brassard[/u] [/b] [IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/capture1-1.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Verac Brassard [/u][/b] [IMG]http://i884.photobucket.com/albums/ac47/tonyboloney2/capture2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Glitch
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

ok you need to put the new item in your server-side in item.java add it in under platebody’s then add the int into your client(client-side).If you could i would ask for rep.

Read full topic
